content:
In the state operator concluded by the state operator contracts for the supply of food for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the price of eggs is set.

About thisinformsThe State Logistics Operator (DOT) is a state agency that meets the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Yes, the average price of eggs is4,93 UAH apiece.

"Step by step we move on so that the military is concentrated only on the main mission," the DOT emphasized.

Recall that the state operator of the rear in three monthsconcluded87 contracts worth UAH 12 billion.

As reportedArmyinform, The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine will build a new procurement architecture that will meet NATO standards and work in the best corporate governance practices.
title: Not “at 17 hryvnias”: what price for eggs is set in contracts for the supply of products for the Armed Forces
description: About it informs the state operator of the rear (DT) - a state agency that meets the needs ...
author: Army Inform
